label: newZealandNCCId
comment: The unique New Zealand National Clearing Code (NCC) identifier as assigned by the New Zealand Bankers' Association (NZBA) for this creditor financial institution.
The unique New Zealand National Clearing Code (NCC) identifier as assigned by the New Zealand Bankers' Association (NZBA) for this debtor financial institution.

domainIncludes.comment: A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that receives money.
A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that owes money.
